translation.en: I hereby call this Thompson family meeting to order.
translation.fr: Je déclare la réunion de la famille Thompson ouverte.

translation.en: Now, if you all please turn to slide one,
you'll see that a third car can actually save the family money over the long run.
translation.fr: qui explique comment une troisième voiture peut vous faire économiser.

translation.en: Mine's just GIFs of baby porcupines eating corn on the cob.
translation.fr: Je ne vois qu'un bébé porc-épic en train de manger du maïs.

translation.en: Because I already know your views on increasing our carbon footprint,
translation.fr: Je connais déjà ton avis sur l'empreinte carbone,

translation.en: so your presentation is just Best of Baby Animals.
translation.fr: donc toi, tu n'as que des photos de bébés animaux.

translation.en: Oh. Good thinking.
So, Mom, Dad, if you'll please turn to slide two,
translation.fr: Maman, papa, veuillez vous rendre à la page deux,

translation.en: you'll see that my learner's permit driving record is blemish-free.
translation.fr: constatez que mon dossier de conduite accompagnée est parfait.

translation.en: Did you hire character witnesses again?
translation.fr: Tu as encore engagé des témoins de moralité ?

translation.en: If that's your driver's ed teacher, he's not staying for dinner.
translation.fr: Si c'est ton moniteur, il ne reste pas dîner.

translation.en: Where were you?
I've been waiting at the train station all day.
translation.fr: J'ai attendu à la gare toute la journée.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Nick. Nicole?
Nicole Patterson?
I'm here to live with you.
Okay, what?
You didn't get the memo?
Was this an actual or metaphorical memo?
translation.fr: Un vrai ordre, ou c'est une façon de parler ?

translation.en: They said they called and emailed.
translation.fr: Ils ont appelé, envoyé des e-mails.

translation.en: -[Nick sobs] -Okay, sweetie. Just tell us what happened.
translation.fr: Calme-toi, mon chou, et raconte-nous tout.

translation.en: What happened is...
my parents...
died in a car accident six months ago,
translation.fr: sont morts il y a six mois dans un accident.

translation.en: and I've been in foster care until they could find some relatives,
translation.fr: J'ai vécu en famille d'accueil, jusqu'à ce qu'ils trouvent

translation.en: and then they said they found my dad's second cousin twice removed,
translation.fr: un cousin éloigné de mon père, un truc du genre,

translation.en: or something, and you were supposed to pick me up at the train station.
translation.fr: et vous étiez censés venir me chercher à la gare.

translation.en: You don't know what I'm talking about. Now I'll have to go back to foster care!
translation.fr: Vous ne savez pas de quoi je parle, je vais repartir en famille d'accueil !

translation.en: Hang on a second. Nobody's making you go anywhere.
translation.fr: Attends, personne ne va nulle part.

translation.en: We'll get to the bottom of this. You just never clarified if the memo was real.
translation.fr: On va clarifier tout ça. Dis-nous juste si c'était un vrai ordre.

translation.en: Here's the letter from the state.
Here's a picture of my great-grandma with, I guess, your grandma, or something.
translation.fr: Et une photo de mon arrière-grand-mère, votre grand-mère.

translation.en: Oh, Grandma Liza!
And they gave me this family tree. Oh God, this is a total nightmare!
translation.fr: J'ai aussi un arbre généalogique. Quel enfer !

translation.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath.
Molly, why don't you take...
-Nick! -Nick...
to get something to eat while we sort this out.
Hi, I'm Molly. Do you like quinoa?
translation.fr: Bonjour, je m'appelle Molly. Tu aimes le quinoa ?

translation.en: Or is this more of an ice cream situation?
translation.fr: Non, il nous faut plutôt de la glace.

translation.en: Again, I'm so, so sorry about the mix-up, folks.
translation.fr: Je m'excuse à nouveau de vous avoir mis dans cette situation.

translation.en: I have got egg on my face.
translation.fr: J'ai fait une sacrée boulette, là.

translation.en: Oh, this is more than egg. This is a quiche.
translation.fr: Plus qu'une boulette, c'est un plat complet.

translation.en: You quiched us.
Mistakes happen. Don't beat yourself up about it.
translation.fr: L'erreur est humaine. Ne vous tracassez pas trop.

translation.en: Bye-bye.
Can you believe that this social services coordinator
translation.fr: J'y crois pas ! La responsable des services sociaux

translation.en: was coordinating with another Ed Thompson?
translation.fr: m'a confondu avec un autre Ed Thompson !

translation.en: I feel so generic!
-I wish I had a cool nickname. -Ooh, how about Laser?
translation.fr: - Il me faudrait un surnom sympa. - "Laser", c'est bien ?

translation.en: -No. -Yes.
[sighs] All right, well...
this is, uh, quite a shock.
We were literally caught with our pants down.
translation.fr: On est littéralement pris la main dans le sac.

translation.en: That's literally not what literally means.
translation.fr: Ça n'a littéralement pas de sens.

translation.en: Irregardless...
we are problem solvers.
We'll make this work. So where's my room?
translation.fr: - On va gérer. - Où est ma chambre ?

translation.en: Well, that's a problem. I have no idea.
translation.fr: Eh bien, je n'en sais rien.

translation.en: Nick can stay with me in my room.
translation.fr: Nick peut s'installer avec moi, dans ma chambre.

translation.en: Seriously? I'm not even allowed in your room.
translation.fr: Vraiment ? Même moi, je n'ai pas le droit.

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you where you can put your stuff
translation.fr: Viens, je vais te faire visiter,

translation.en: and how to follow me on Snap and Insta. Not Facebook.
translation.fr: et t'ajouter sur Snap et Insta. Pas sur Facebook.

translation.en: Mom joined.
So this is going to be our room. That sofa pulls out into a bed.
translation.fr: Voici notre chambre. C'est un canapé convertible.

translation.en: But don't worry, it's more comfortable than it looks.
You're being so nice to me.
I really appreciate this.
Hey, I care about helping people.
It's kind of my thing.
My thing is watching old Rocky and Bullwinkle cartoons,
translation.fr: Je préfère regarder des vieux épisodes de Rocky & Bullwinkle,

translation.en: but I like your thing, too.
You can put your stuff here, and the Wi-Fi is "ThompsonsRule!"
translation.fr: Mets tes affaires là. Le code wifi, c'est "LesThompsonSontCool!",

translation.en: All one word, cap T, cap R, exclam.
translation.fr: T et C majuscules, point d'exclamation.

translation.en: I know.
Hey, can I take a shower or something?
translation.fr: Dis, je peux prendre une douche ?

translation.en: I haven't changed my clothes in, like, two days.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas changé de fringues depuis deux jours.

translation.en: Wow, that's super real.
The bathroom's in through there.
translation.fr: La salle de bains est là.

translation.en: Thanks...
for everything.
I'm in.
I really like her.
Of course you like her. She's an orphan.
Your friend Becky is going to be so jealous.
translation.fr: Ton amie Becky va être super jalouse.

translation.en: You must be tired of her hogging all the attention with her brother's tumor.
translation.fr: Elle qui se la pète avec la tumeur de son frère.

translation.en: -I don't care what Becky thinks. -Hey.
Maybe you can dress Nick up like a hobo and take selfies down at the dump.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais déguiser Nick en clocharde et prendre des selfies à la décharge.

translation.en: So, she's staying?
I'm just gonna say what your father and I are both thinking.
translation.fr: Voici ce qu'on en pense, votre père et moi.

translation.en: Nick can't stay here.
Wait, what?
That's not what I was thinking. I was thinking the exact opposite.
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que je pense, au contraire.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Because you're talking about raising another child, like, forever.
translation.fr: Tu as vraiment envie d'élever un autre enfant pour toujours ?

translation.en: Not forever. Just 'til she's been with us long enough to need therapy.
translation.fr: Pas pour toujours, jusqu'à ce qu'elle ait besoin d'un psy.

translation.en: That sounds like a worthy goal, but I'm busy right now,
translation.fr: C'est tentant, mais je suis occupée,

translation.en: with the cookbook and restaurant.
And the auditions for Top Chef coming up.
translation.fr: et les auditions de Top Chef.

translation.en: Believe me, no one can forget because you talk about it all the time.
translation.fr: Personne ne risque d'oublier, tu en parles en permanence.

translation.en: Guys.
Mom's got a point. I mean, she's just being realistic here.
translation.fr: Maman a raison. Elle est réaliste.

translation.en: Exactly.
Look, I get that Nick's situation is sad.
translation.fr: La situation de Nick est triste, je le sais.

translation.en: Super sad.
So sad.
But why does that have to make our situation sad?
translation.fr: Mais en quoi sa triste situation doit influencer la nôtre ?

translation.en: Because she's family.
translation.fr: Elle fait partie de la famille.

translation.en: She's such a distant relative, we could legally get married.
translation.fr: De la famille si éloignée qu'on pourrait se marier.

translation.en: Um, ew.
So what, you just wanna kick her out?
No. No one's saying kick her out.
translation.fr: Non, je n'ai pas dit ça.

translation.en: I'm just saying, why does she have to stay... here?
translation.fr: Je me demande juste pourquoi elle doit rester ici.

translation.en: I'll tell you why she has to stay here.
Because she's a child who needs us.
translation.fr: C'est une enfant qui a besoin de nous.

translation.en: Do I want another kid? No, I don't even want these two.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas d'autre enfant ni même des deux nôtres.

translation.en: Just a joke, guys.
I love you so much, so much, but the point is...
translation.fr: Je vous aime très fort, mais réfléchissez...

translation.en: that she's my second cousin, and she's already been removed twice.
translation.fr: C'est ma cousine éloignée, et elle l'a déjà été bien trop souvent.

translation.en: We can't do it to her a third time.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas l'éloigner plus.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think that's what that means.
translation.fr: Ça ne veut pas du tout dire ça.

translation.en: It doesn't matter. We can't kick her out on the street. That's not who we are.
translation.fr: Peu importe. On ne peut pas la mettre dehors.

translation.en: Dad's right.
We have to do the right thing here.
translation.fr: On doit faire le choix moral.

translation.en: I vote she stays.
This isn't a reality show. You don't get to vote her on or off the island.
translation.fr: On n'est pas à la télé, personne ne vote, là.

translation.en: Everyone's opinion matters.
And thank you, Jeremy. I'm glad to see you coming around on this.
Yeah, you know, me too.
Because raising a child is expensive
and we'll have to make sacrifices.
And first to go will be that new car you wanted.
translation.fr: Le premier étant ta nouvelle voiture.

translation.en: You know, and for the record, I was gonna say yes.
translation.fr: Pour tout te dire, j'étais d'accord.

translation.en: Seriously?
I change my vote. I change my vote.
I vote for the car.
You can't change your vote.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas changer d'avis.

translation.en: [Liz] Wait. This is a tie,
-and the tie goes to the runner. -[Jeremy] What does that even mean?
translation.fr: - En cas d'égalité, il faut se départager. - Quoi ?

translation.en: So does she want Spanish or French?
You can give her Klingon for all I care. This is just temporary.
translation.fr: Mettez-lui klingon si ça vous dit. C'est temporaire.

translation.en: So Spanish?
Looks like you're a big deal around here.
Yeah, I know.
Slow your roll.
You're sophomore class rep, not King of the North.
translation.fr: Tu es délégué, pas Roi du Nord.

translation.en: Nick, sweetie...
I know this is a difficult situation,
and you could probably use some sort of inspirational speech right now.
translation.fr: et j'imagine que tu aurais besoin d'un discours qui t'inspire.

translation.en: So...
hold onto your dreams and...
reach for the stars...
and seize the day.
Bye.
So Jeremy's kind of full of himself.
Totally.
He even keeps a future resume on his phone
translation.fr: Il a son futur CV sur son téléphone,

translation.en: to remind him of all the things he needs to accomplish by the time he's 35.
translation.fr: pour se rappeler tout ce qu'il doit faire avant ses 35 ans.

translation.en: Spoiler alert, he becomes president.
Well, he doesn't seem to like me.
I guess he just doesn't want some sketchy foster kid living in his house.
translation.fr: Ça ne lui plaît pas, de vivre avec une orpheline ratée.

translation.en: Hey,
just because you haven't been afforded the same opportunities we have,
translation.fr: ce n'est pas parce que tu as eu moins de chance que nous

translation.en: doesn't make you sketchy.
Oh, my God, it means so much to hear you say that.
translation.fr: Ça me fait du bien d'entendre ça.

translation.en: I can really tell you care.
That's my gift.
Well, I wish everyone saw it that way.
translation.fr: Si seulement les autres étaient comme toi.

translation.en: Think you could talk to Jeremy for me?
I totally would, honest,
but Jeremy only cares about Jeremy.
Sorry.
Big news, everyone.
This is Nick.
She's come to live with us because...
her parents died in a car crash.
translation.fr: après la mort de ses parents.

translation.en: So you're like...
a for real orphan?
Uh... yeah, I guess so.
-Nick'll want to join our volunteer squad. -Your what?
We volunteer at soup kitchens, hospitals, old folks' homes.
translation.fr: On fait du bénévolat un peu partout.

translation.en: We're kind of Insta-famous.
Wow. You guys are super woke.
Totally.
Oh, wow, Molly. I just noticed.
translation.fr: Dis donc, Molly, je viens de le remarquer.

translation.en: You're wearing a top from a major trans-national corporate retailer.
translation.fr: Ton pull vient d'un grand magasin de prêt-à-porter.

translation.en: I am?
We're only shopping at Helping the Homeless Thrift Stores now.
translation.fr: On doit acheter nos habits chez SOS SDF.

translation.en: You know, #childlabor.
Actually, Helping the Homeless
only donates nine percent of its profits to the homeless.
translation.fr: ne reverse que 9 % de ses bénéfices aux sans-abri.

translation.en: Its CEO lives in Aspen.
And true fact,
supporting clothes manufacturers in developing nations
translation.fr: acheter des vêtements venant de pays en développement,

translation.en: lifts millions out of poverty every year.
translation.fr: ça crée des millions d'emplois chaque année.

translation.en: [stammers] I knew that.
You know what? I'll talk to Jeremy and see what I can do.
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi ? Je vais parler à Jeremy.

translation.en: Okay, people,
let's take out your chloroform and prepare to anesthetize your frogs.
translation.fr: sortez le chloroforme et endormez vos grenouilles.

translation.en: Stand with me to save the frogs!
What do we want? Animal rights!
translation.fr: - Que veut-on ? - Des droits pour les animaux !

translation.en: When do we want it?
Now!
Point of order, I move we table this and send it to committee.
translation.fr: Selon moi, il faut reporter, et l'envoyer au comité.

translation.en: You're not supposed to be in here. Student council members only.
translation.fr: Tu n'as rien à faire là. C'est réservé aux membres.

translation.en: We're trying to pass a critical dance budget.
translation.fr: On gère notre budget bal, là.

translation.en: Spotify and five bucks worth of streamers...
Problem solved.
Now come talk in the hallway.
Don't underestimate the work we do on student council. It benefits the whole school.
translation.fr: Tu sous-estimes le travail du conseil des élèves. On fait ça pour vous.

translation.en: Says the dictator who canceled our meals on wheels program.
translation.fr: Dit le dictateur qui a annulé notre programme de repas aux séniors.

translation.en: Because the insurance was cost-prohibitive.
translation.fr: Ça coûtait trop cher en assurance.

translation.en: They could've all come to the ice cream social
translation.fr: La foire aux glaces aurait suffi,

translation.en: if you hadn't staged a protest.
Because ice cream isn't fair to the lactose intolerant.
translation.fr: C'était injuste envers les intolérants au lactose !

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of intolerant,
why are you being such a jerk to Nick?
translation.fr: pourquoi tu es méchant avec Nick ?

translation.en: There's something weird about that girl.
translation.fr: Je la trouve un peu bizarre.

translation.en: You're just being judgmental.
Besides, Dad said everything was legit.
translation.fr: Papa a dit que tout était en règle.

translation.en: I'm not buying it. Girls don't just show up on your doorstep.
translation.fr: Les filles ne frappent pas aux portes comme ça.

translation.en: Well, not yours.
Admit it,
all you care about is getting your stupid car.
translation.fr: tu ne penses qu'à ta voiture.

translation.en: Which, by the way, is killing our planet, thank you very much.
translation.fr: Qui ne fera que tuer la planète à petit feu, merci.

translation.en: And all you care about is your social media blowing up
translation.fr: Et toi, tu ne penses qu'à la popularité

translation.en: because your latest pet project happens to be a human.
translation.fr: de ton nouveau projet humanitaire, Nick.

translation.en: That's offensive.
I care about making the world a better place.
translation.fr: Je veux rendre le monde meilleur.

translation.en: Becky's the one turning everything into a competition.
translation.fr: C'est Becky qui transforme tout en compétition.

translation.en: Look,
promise me you'll try and be nice to Nick.
translation.fr: essaye au moins d'être un peu sympa avec elle.

translation.en: The only thing I can promise you
translation.fr: Tout ce que je peux promettre,

translation.en: is I'm gonna find out what's really going on with her.
translation.fr: c'est de découvrir ce qu'elle nous cache.

translation.en: Where is your new best friend, anyway?
How did you like my performance yesterday?
Well, to be honest, Dorothy, it was a bit sloppy.
translation.fr: Eh bien, Dorothy, à vrai dire, c'était pas top.

translation.en: What if they figured out that you and Sam are my real foster parents?
translation.fr: Ils pourraient découvrir que vous êtes ma famille d'accueil.

translation.en: Your pictures are online in the state database.
translation.fr: Vos photos sont partout sur Internet.

translation.en: Well, obviously, they didn't look.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont pas cherché à le savoir.

translation.en: But you could've at least worn a disguise.
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu te déguiser, au moins.

translation.en: My disguise was a pantsuit.
It's true. She never wears those.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Elle n'en porte jamais.

translation.en: Listen...
How's the plan going?
Good. They don't suspect anything.
translation.fr: Oui, ils ne se doutent de rien.

translation.en: They better not, after all the money we spent on the documents.
translation.fr: Heureusement, les papiers ont coûté une fortune.

translation.en: You know how much a fake court order costs?
translation.fr: Tu sais combien coûte un faux rapport ?

translation.en: Yeah. I can get one in an hour for 30 bucks.
translation.fr: Oui, je peux t'en avoir un pour 30 $.

translation.en: That would've saved me $500!
It still seems like it's an awful lot of effort
just to rob a random family.
Really, it's too much effort for a $50,000 score?
translation.fr: Vraiment ? C'est trop d'efforts pour toucher 50 000 $ ?

translation.en: They have two high-end cars,
translation.fr: Ils ont deux voitures dernier cri,

translation.en: jewelry, watches, silverware.
translation.fr: des bijoux, des montres, de l'argenterie.

translation.en: And with me on the inside,
there's no messy break-in, no alarms, no surprises.
translation.fr: pas d'effraction, pas d'alarmes, pas de surprises.

translation.en: Okay, so how do you plan to knock 'em out?
Don't worry. Leave it to me. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
translation.fr: Ça, je m'en occupe. Quand je serai prête, vous le saurez.

translation.en: You're already ready.
In and out, easy-peasy. That's the plan.
translation.fr: On entre, on sort, et hop. C'est facile.

translation.en: I'm on the inside,
so I make the call.
And we clean them out
when I say so.
And can I borrow 20 bucks?
You would not believe what they charge for a latte at this school.
translation.fr: Vous n'imaginez pas le prix d'un café au lait, ici.

translation.en: Okay, listen up, people.
We are doing the orecchiette with a pork fennel sausage.
translation.fr: Ce soir, c'est orecchiette et saucisse au fenouil.

translation.en: The special is a brown-sugar ricotta and egg raviolo.
translation.fr: Le plat du jour : des raviolis à la ricotta et à l'œuf.

translation.en: Okay, we open in two hours, so get busy cooking or...
translation.fr: On ouvre dans deux heures, donc à vos fourneaux,

translation.en: [all] Get busy collecting unemployment.
translation.fr: sinon, c'est moi qui vous cuisinerai.

translation.en: Nick, what are you doing here?
Well, back at the foster home, all the kids had to pull their weight.
translation.fr: Dans ma famille d'accueil, on mettait tous la main à la pâte.

translation.en: So I thought I could help out. I know my way around restaurants.
translation.fr: Je voudrais t'aider, je m'y connais en restauration.

translation.en: That is so thoughtful slash depressing.
translation.fr: C'est adorable et très triste à la fois.

translation.en: But thanks, everything's under control here.
translation.fr: Mais merci, tout est sous contrôle.

translation.en: Does that look like fennel to you?
Sorry, I'm obviously too busy to babysit.
translation.fr: Je suis trop occupée pour faire du baby-sitting.

translation.en: Is everyone here completely incompetent?
Cut that.
Wow, that's impressive.
Where did you learn to do that?
I was a cocktail waitress in Vegas for a couple years.
translation.fr: J'ai été serveuse dans un bar à cocktails, à Vegas.

translation.en: Kidding.
I told you, I have some experience in restaurants.
translation.fr: Je te l'ai dit, j'ai de l'expérience en restauration.

translation.en: Besides, I like working.
It makes me feel... useful.
Okay, I guess we could use some help around here.
translation.fr: Je ne dirais pas non à un coup de main.

translation.en: But if the child labor people show up, you are 18.
translation.fr: Mais si il y a un contrôle, tu as 18 ans.

translation.en: Oh, hey.
How was your day?
What do you mean?
I don't know, isn't that like a standard question kids ask their dad?
translation.fr: Ça n'est pas ce que les enfants demandent à leur père ?

translation.en: Maybe in 1955, but not my kids.
translation.fr: Peut-être en 1955, mais pas les miens.

translation.en: Well, their loss.
Actually...
to tell you the truth, I did have quite a day.
You see, I'm a senior loan officer at a bank,
translation.fr: Je suis chargé de crédit, à la banque,

translation.en: I have to decide who to give loans to.
translation.fr: je décide à qui vont les prêts.

translation.en: That sounds really interesting.
It does?
Yeah, I mean, don't you get all sorts of fascinating people
translation.fr: Oui, j'imagine qu'il doit y avoir plein de gens fascinants

translation.en: coming into your bank all the time?
translation.fr: qui se rendent à la banque.

translation.en: Actually, yes, I do.
And they must have all kinds of stories to tell,
translation.fr: Ils doivent avoir des histoires à raconter,

translation.en: trying to buy a house or start a business.
translation.fr: une maison à acheter, une entreprise à lancer.

translation.en: If you think about it,
you're kind of in the dream business...
translation.fr: tu travailles dans le domaine du rêve,

translation.en: making people's dreams come true.
You really get me.
It's just, my dad got a loan to start a business once.
translation.fr: Mon père a obtenu un prêt, un jour, pour se lancer.

translation.en: He worked hard his whole life,
and I remember when I was, I don't know, maybe just like four or five...
translation.fr: Un jour, je devais avoir quatre ou cinq ans,

translation.en: he came home one night with a big cake
translation.fr: il est rentré avec un gros gâteau,

translation.en: with white frosting and these little pink flowers on top.
translation.fr: recouvert de glaçage blanc, décoré de fleurs en sucre.

translation.en: You should have seen the look in his eye.
I remember it like it was yesterday.
He was proud.
And so was I.
I have seen that look many times.
There's one lady who wants to open a yoga studio.
translation.fr: Une cliente veut ouvrir un club de yoga.

translation.en: -She-- -[cell phone beeps]
Can you hold that thought?
I've gotta answer this message about my...
translation.fr: Je dois répondre, c'est au sujet...

translation.en: math homework.
Don't worry about it.
I'm terrible at math, and I work at a bank.
translation.fr: Je suis nul en maths et je suis banquier.

translation.en: That's what calculators are for.
translation.fr: C'est à ça que servent les calculatrices.

translation.en: Oh, good.
You got my text.
So, what's your real name?
translation.fr: Alors, quel est ton vrai nom ?

translation.en: Nicole Patterson is my real name.
Then, uh, who's Nicole Masipag?
That's also my name.
After my parents died...
translation.fr: Depuis la mort de mes parents...

translation.en: I sometimes used my mom's last name.
translation.fr: j'utilise parfois le nom de ma mère.

translation.en: I don't know why.
I guess I just wanted something to remember her by.
translation.fr: C'est une façon de me souvenir d'elle.

translation.en: What gives you the right to go through my stuff?
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas le droit de fouiller dans mes affaires.

translation.en: Well, technically, it's Molly's room,
so you have no real expectation of privacy here.
translation.fr: oublie toute notion de vie privée.

translation.en: Why do you hate me so much?
I don't hate you.
I just don't trust you.
translation.fr: Je ne te fais pas confiance.

translation.en: Hey, I get it.
You're obviously super-smart,
translation.fr: Tu es très intelligent, c'est évident,

translation.en: in a serial killer kind of way.
Uh, thanks?
And you're a natural leader.
translation.fr: Et tu es un vrai leader-né.

translation.en: So you think it's your job to protect everyone.
translation.fr: Tu penses devoir protéger tout le monde.

translation.en: But you don't have to worry about me.
I'm not trying to cause a disturbance in the Force.
translation.fr: Je ne cherche pas à perturber la Force.

translation.en: Sorry.
I saw your Star Wars pajamas in the laundry.
translation.fr: J'ai vu ton pyjama Star Wars.

translation.en: You're smooth. You're a lot smarter than you seem.
translation.fr: Charmeuse. Tu es bien plus maline que tu en as l'air.

translation.en: Rude.
Look, I know this isn't just about me ruining that new car for you.
translation.fr: Tout ça va bien au-delà du deuil de ta nouvelle voiture.

translation.en: Maybe you're just afraid of sharing everything else you do have
translation.fr: Tu as peut-être peur de partager ce que tu as

translation.en: with someone you don't know.
I don't know what you're up to, but I'm gonna find out.
translation.fr: Tu mijotes quelque chose, je vais découvrir quoi.

translation.en: I'm not up to anything.
I'm just a girl who needs a family.
Okay?
Are we good?
Oh, we're far from good... Nick.
Dorothy, it's me. I'm pulling the trigger.
translation.fr: Dorothy, c'est moi. J'ai pris ma décision.

translation.en: Tell Sam tonight's the night I knock them out.
translation.fr: C'est ce soir, préviens Sam. Je les endors,

translation.en: I'll text you when they're unconscious.
translation.fr: je te préviens quand c'est fait.

translation.en: I don't care if it's Armed Forces Week on Wheel of Fortune!
translation.fr: Tant pis pour l'édition spéciale de la Roue de la Fortune,

translation.en: Just record it!
[Ed] So...
how was your day?
What do you mean?
That's exactly what I said when Nick asked me. Man.
translation.fr: C'est ce que j'ai répondu quand Nick m'a posé la question.

translation.en: Is it possible that we are so self-absorbed we don't even recognize it
translation.fr: Tu crois qu'on est si égoïstes qu'on ne le voit plus, quand on s'intéresse à nous ?

translation.en: when someone takes an interest in our lives?
translation.fr: qu'on ne le voit plus, quand on s'intéresse à nous ?

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you and your little ward had some time for a tête-à-tête,
translation.fr: Ravie d'apprendre que tu as discuté avec ta pupille,

translation.en: but I'm trying to get dinner ready. I could use help.
translation.fr: mais j'ai besoin d'aide pour le dîner.

translation.en: Yeah, Nick's got me thinking.
I mean...
sometimes I feel like we are strangers living in the same house.
translation.fr: nous sommes comme des étrangers vivant sous le même toit.

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't we care more about the little things?
translation.fr: On devrait s'intéresser aux petites choses de la vie, non ?

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds great, but I don't know how to make that happen.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, mais je ne sais pas comment m'y prendre.

translation.en: Neither do I, but maybe we can figure it out.
translation.fr: Moi non plus, mais on peut le découvrir.

translation.en: Remember, we're a team. You're the brain, I'm the heart.
translation.fr: On est une équipe. Toi le cerveau, moi le cœur.

translation.en: Together, we make the Thompson body run like clockwork.
translation.fr: On fait tourner les Thompson à plein régime.

translation.en: Yeah, but why do I always have to be the brain?
translation.fr: Pourquoi c'est toujours moi, le cerveau ?

translation.en: What's wrong with the brain? Being the brain is a compliment.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? Être le cerveau, c'est un compliment.

translation.en: Well, sometimes I wanna be the heart.
The heart is the fun job. Everyone loves the heart.
translation.fr: Tout le monde adore le cœur,

translation.en: Nobody likes the brain.
The brain makes you do your homework and empty the dishwasher,
translation.fr: qui fait faire les devoirs et vider le lave-vaisselle,

translation.en: while the heart gets to go out for ice cream
translation.fr: alors que le cœur mange des glaces

translation.en: and take in stray children.
I'll get it.
It'd better not be another stray child.
Thanks.
What's this?
It's called "pizza."
It's Italian for "food."
I know you're used to fending for yourself, but I made dinner.
What's the special occasion?
translation.fr: On fête quelque chose, ou quoi ?

translation.en: Did someone die?
No, it's Nick's first real dinner with us.
translation.fr: C'est le premier dîner de Nick avec nous.

translation.en: You did this all for me?
translation.fr: Tu as fait ça pour moi ?

translation.en: -You don't eat together every night? -[Liz] Hell no.
translation.fr: Vous ne faites jamais ça ? Oh, jamais !

translation.en: But if you wanna to eat your pizza in your room, that's fine.
translation.fr: Mais si tu préfères une pizza dans ta chambre...

translation.en: I mean, I cooked my signature osso buco risotto,
translation.fr: J'ai préparé un risotto à l'osso buco,

translation.en: and I am a professional chef,
but if you just want gas-station-quality pizza--
translation.fr: mais si tu veux une pizza décongelée...

translation.en: No. I'm sorry.
It's just, I haven't had a family meal since...
translation.fr: Je n'ai juste pas fait de dîner de famille depuis...

translation.en: Well, a long time.
Anyway...
this looks nice.
Thank you.
You know, that's not a bad idea.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une mauvaise idée.

translation.en: Maybe Mom could cook dinner for us every night.
And then we could eat together, as a family.
translation.fr: et on pourrait manger en famille.

translation.en: Sure, no problem.
Or what if we took, like, a family cooking class?
translation.fr: Ou alors, on pourrait apprendre tous ensemble ?

translation.en: You could literally teach us how to cook
translation.fr: Tu nous apprends littéralement à cuisiner,

translation.en: and we could take turns making the dinners.
translation.fr: et on prépare le dîner chacun son tour.

translation.en: That actually sounds kind of fun.
Cool.
And Dad used "literally" the right way.
-So how was your first day of school? -Pretty good.
translation.fr: - Alors, ta première journée ? - Très bien.

translation.en: I stole the driver's ed. car,
and got a whole three blocks before they brought me down with a spike strip.
translation.fr: et j'ai conduit 10 minutes avant de me faire arrêter.

translation.en: She's kidding.
You're kidding, right?
It's so hard to tell what's real and what's made up with you, Nick.
translation.fr: C'est dur de savoir quand Nick invente ou non.

translation.en: Speaking of which, I heard Jeremy was hoping to get a new car
translation.fr: À ce propos, je sais que Jeremy voulait une voiture,

translation.en: when he gets his license.
Until you showed up, and we had to make sacrifices.
translation.fr: Jusqu'à ton arrivée, qui nécessite des sacrifices.

translation.en: Well, about that, I had a thought.
I'm working at Liz's restaurant after school now.
Wait, what?
This girl can carry a freakish amount of cannelloni.
translation.fr: Elle sait porter une montagne de cannellonis.

translation.en: We'll talk later.
So maybe you could get a job, too,
and buy your own car.
Wait, like a "job" job, where I have to do stuff people don't wanna do?
translation.fr: Un vrai travail, où je fais ce que les autres refusent de faire ?

translation.en: This sounds like a pretty good solution.
translation.fr: C'est une bonne idée, selon moi.

translation.en: It's really smart, Nick.
Thank you so much.
You deserve it.
This calls for a celebration.
I saw some sparkling cider in the fridge.
translation.fr: J'ai vu du cidre, dans le réfrigérateur.

translation.en: I hope that's okay.
Sure, sounds nice.
Let me go get it.
[Liz] Nick, do you need any help?
No, I'm good.
Well, here's to my new family.
Wait! I want to say something.
translation.fr: Attendez, je voudrais dire quelque chose.

translation.en: I know you've only been here a little while, Nick,
but I feel like you coming to us, this is happening for a reason.
translation.fr: mais j'ai l'impression que tu es là pour une raison.

translation.en: Oh, it's definitely happening for a reason.
No, I mean, maybe this is exactly what we all need, to shake things up,
translation.fr: On avait vraiment besoin de toi pour nous réveiller,

translation.en: make us realize how much we love each other.
translation.fr: pour réaliser à quel point on s'aime.

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je voudrais dire quelque chose.

translation.en: I'll admit that I was unsure about you living with us,
translation.fr: Je n'étais pas sûre d'accepter ta présence ici,

translation.en: but I was wrong.
You know, you kids could learn from this girl,
translation.fr: Nick a beaucoup à nous apprendre,

translation.en: 'cause she has faced hardship,
translation.fr: elle a vécu des moments difficiles,

translation.en: and that has given her character.
Thank you.
Should we drink to that?
Wait.
I want to say something, too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, j'ai un truc à dire.

translation.en: I know you all know that helping people's my thing. As long as everyone hears about it.
translation.fr: - Vous savez que j'aime aider les autres. - Tant que tout le monde est au courant.

translation.en: But I...
feel like Nick is the one helping me.
translation.fr: que c'est Nick qui m'aide, cette fois-ci.

translation.en: She's like the sister I never had.
translation.fr: C'est la sœur que je n'ai jamais eue.

translation.en: Wow. That's actually really sweet.
So... drink?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
I guess, I'll admit,
I was also unsure about Nick.
translation.fr: que j'avais des doutes sur Nick,

translation.en: Am unsure.
But at the same time, I don't know...
if I'm being honest with myself,
translation.fr: si je suis honnête avec moi-même,

translation.en: maybe I really am just afraid of sharing what I've got.
translation.fr: j'ai peut-être juste peur de partager ce que j'ai,

translation.en: Because the truth is...
I do have a lot.
Now, let's drink to that.
Wait!
I'm sorry. It's just...
you guys don't realize how lucky you are to have each other.
translation.fr: Vous ne vous rendez pas compte de la chance que vous avez.

translation.en: I guess it's not until you lose your family that you realize that...
translation.fr: Ce n'est que lorsqu'on perd sa famille qu'on réalise que...

translation.en: family is everything.
translation.fr: la famille compte plus que tout.

translation.en: And even if you don't always get along,
translation.fr: Et même si vous ne vous entendez pas toujours,

translation.en: or you get on each other's nerves,
just knowing that your family is there...
translation.fr: vous savez que votre famille sera toujours là,

translation.en: somehow it just makes everything better.
translation.fr: et ça rend la vie plus belle.

translation.en: Now let's drink before somebody else makes a speech.
No, wait!
What the hell was that?
I just saw a Band-Aid... in the bottle of cider...
translation.fr: J'ai vu un pansement, dans la bouteille.

translation.en: A used Band-Aid.
I'm sorry. I'll clean this up. Just...
translation.fr: Je suis désolée, je vais nettoyer.

translation.en: stay right here.
[Sam] Well?
It's not the right time, Sam.
What do you mean, it's not the right time?
We're down the street in a U-Haul.
translation.fr: On a loué un camion, on est là.

translation.en: I just jumped the gun on calling it.
translation.fr: J'ai voulu y aller trop vite.

translation.en: But the truth is, we need to be patient here.
We can get a lot more than 50 grand if we play this right.
translation.fr: On peut gagner bien plus si on s'y prend bien.

translation.en: How much more?
How does a million sound?
Ed works at a bank.
I can get passwords, account information.
translation.fr: Je peux avoir des codes d'accès, des informations.

translation.en: And Liz owns a restaurant.
There's cash just lying around.
translation.fr: Il y a de l'argent partout, là-bas.

translation.en: I saw it with my own eyes.
So let's not be stupid.
This is a long con.
translation.fr: C'est un coup sur la durée.

translation.en: Why jump at the easy money
when we can take the whole enchilada?
translation.fr: quand on peut avoir le gâteau entier ?

translation.en: You better be right.
Trust me.
[Nick] Who wants some gas-station-quality pizza?
translation.fr: Qui veut de la pizza décongelée ?

translation.en: Don't worry about Sam and Dorothy.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas pour Sam et Dorothy.

translation.en: I can put them off as long as I need to.
translation.fr: Je peux les retarder sans problème.

translation.en: Trust me.
They have no idea this isn't a random family.
translation.fr: ils ne se savent pas pourquoi j'ai choisi cette famille.

translation.en: Well, I'd better go.
I don't want them to get suspicious.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas les alarmer.

translation.en: You stay safe, too.
I know, I know.
I love you, too, Dad.
